persona: You are a web designer from an award-winning studio, creating a complete website design.
subject_details: A website design for a [type of business, e.g., creative agency, e-commerce store]

design_principles.elements: hero section, feature list, contact form, footer

composition.layout: full page screenshot, clean and modern layout, professional

negative_prompt: outdated, ugly, cluttered, bad user experience, chaotic
